situation.title: Buying real estate and moving in or out
situation.meta_description: The sale and purchase of real estate is possible in times of emergency.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

 

Sale and purchase of a real estate

The sale and purchase of real estate are possible in times of emergency. Now, however, this should only happen in cases of absolute necessity (e.g. because inspections of flats are limited and there should be no contact with other people outside your residence). If it is not necessary, postpone the purchase or sale of real estate until a more favourable epidemiological situation.

Due to the restrictions on free movement, personal inspections of houses or flats can only take place in cases of absolute necessity (this is, for example, a situation where your rental agreement ends and you must secure new housing, housing is your basic need). Only one person or couple and one real estate agent may take part in such a tour. However, it is possible to tour the apartment online.

Moving

If you are not in quarantine or isolation, moving is possible. But limit it to the necessary cases. If you are not in a hurry, move them to a time when the risk of infection is lower.

When moving, it is necessary to follow increased hygienic measures, especially to have a face mask on during the entire period of contact with persons outside the family, to disinfect your hands and to social distance. Also, ventilate the area regularly for prevention.

questions_answers.question: Are personal inspections of houses and flats allowed?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but only in cases of absolute necessity.

questions_answers.question: Is it possible to move during the state of emergency?
questions_answers.value: Yes, if, for example, you have a lease signed, you are not in quarantine or in isolation you can move.

questions_answers.question: Can I move, when I am in isolation or quarantine?
What shall if I am in quarantine but my lease expires?
questions_answers.value: If you are in quarantine, you generally cannot leave the place where you started it. If your lease expires, contact your landlord and ask them to wait until the quarantine or isolation is over. The landlord should comply with the request but is entitled to claim rent for another period.  However, if your lease ends, for example, due to a gross breach of contract or by a court notice, the move cannot be postponed because of quarantine, as this would be a breach of the enforcement of a court decision.

questions_answers.question: Can I build a house by myself?
Can my friends help with the building?
Are furniture shops open?
questions_answers.value: Yes. However, there is a limitation of 1 customer per 15 square meters of the shop.
